sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import FileUploader from "../../shared/FileUploader"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { convertFileToUrl } from "../../libs/utils.ts"; import { useCallback, useState,useRef } from "react"; import { useDropzone } from "react-dropzone"; import Button from "@mui/material/Button"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import fileupload from "../../assets/icons/file-upload.svg"; import axios from 'axios'; export default function PostForm({ fieldChange, mediaUrl }) { const navigate = useNavigate(); return (
